languages.text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Чистила ряды кабала от тех, кто мешал тебе?... Даже это тебе не удалось, бездарное ты ничтожество. Я все еще здесь. Я буду тем, кто очистит Опустошительную бурю от тебя самой".

{n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Чистила ряды кабала от тех, кто мешал тебе?... Даже это тебе не удалось, бездарное ты ничтожество. Я все еще здесь. Я буду тем, кто очистит Опустошительную бурю от тебя самой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你说你清洗了阴谋团的队伍？还消灭了道路上所有的障碍？可你甚至连这件事情都没做成，你这没用的废物，我还活着呢。现在，轮到我把你从狂风阴谋团的队伍中清理出去了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你说你清洗了阴谋团的队伍？还消灭了道路上所有的障碍？可你甚至连这件事情都没做成，你这没用的废物，我还活着呢。现在，轮到我把你从狂风阴谋团的队伍中清理出去了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous croyez avoir purgé les rangs de la Kabale et supprimé tous les obstacles qui vous barraient la route ? Et pourtant, vous avez échoué, dénuée de talent comme vous l'êtes. Car je suis toujours là. Et c'est moi qui purgerai la Tempête ravageuse de votre présence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous croyez avoir purgé les rangs de la Kabale et supprimé tous les obstacles qui vous barraient la route ? Et pourtant, vous avez échoué, dénuée de talent comme vous l'êtes. Car je suis toujours là. Et c'est moi qui purgerai la Tempête ravageuse de votre présence. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Afirmas haber purgado las filas de la Kábala y eliminado todos los obstáculos de tu camino? Hasta en eso has fracasado, inútil. Sigo aquí y seré yo quien purgue la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora de tu presencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Afirmas haber purgado las filas de la Kábala y eliminado todos los obstáculos de tu camino? Hasta en eso has fracasado, inútil. Sigo aquí y seré yo quien purgue la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora de tu presencia».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を細める。{/n}「陰謀団のメンバーを粛清して、眼前の障害は全て排除しただと？それも失敗だ、この無能の恥知らずが。俺はまだここにいる。俺がリーヴィング・テンペストからお前を消し去ってやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは目を細める。{/n}「陰謀団のメンバーを粛清して、眼前の障害は全て排除しただと？それも失敗だ、この無能の恥知らずが。俺はまだここにいる。俺がリーヴィング・テンペストからお前を消し去ってやる」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr habt die Reihen der Kabale gesäubert und alle Hindernisse aus Eurem Weg geräumt? Selbst darin seid Ihr gescheitert, Ihr unbegabter Wurm. Ich bin noch immer hier. Ich werde den plündernden Sturm von Euch säubern."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr habt die Reihen der Kabale gesäubert und alle Hindernisse aus Eurem Weg geräumt? Selbst darin seid Ihr gescheitert, Ihr unbegabter Wurm. Ich bin noch immer hier. Ich werde den plündernden Sturm von Euch säubern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Kabal saflarını arındırıp yolundaki tüm engelleri temizledin mi? Bunda bile başarısız oldun zavallıcık. Ben hâlâ buradayım. Müfteris Kasırga'yı senden arındıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You purged the ranks of the Kabal and cleared all obstacles from your path? Even in that you failed, you talentless wretch. I am still here. I will be the one to purge the Reaving Tempest of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Kabal saflarını arındırıp yolundaki tüm engelleri temizledin mi? Bunda bile başarısız oldun seni beceriksiz zavallı. Ben hâlâ buradayım. Senin için Müfteris Kasırga'yı arındıracağım, merak etme."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
